thread.section_title: Gym Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gym Source | gymsource.com | 2 of 25
thread.title: Adam

author: Adam
title: Adam
text: I've bought 3 expensive items at this store. Products are good and sales team is knowledgable. Gym Source has a promotional sale pretty much every month, and always has some additional pseudo-sale going on at all times. Staff always presents the hard sale, never telling you about the upcoming sale. Recently I asked if floor models were for sale, was told no and bought a NEW item. On the day of purchase, I walk in and SOLD signs are on half the floor models. "Oh, we are moving locations and had to sell" they said. Also, other salesman don't waste their time with you because they don't get your commission. These are issues management should work out.
